ConfigInfo.Name: DDoS Methodology
ConfigInfo.MethodologyDescription: Validate the ability of a SUT to forward traffic while undergoing DDoS attacks.

sql_statement.static: CREATE TABLE MyEpoch AS SELECT (julianday('now'))*86400.0 AS Data

sql_statement.static: SELECT Y.SourcePortTag AS Port,Y.StartTime AS Time,SUM(BW)+(SELECT SUM(Z.Bandwidth) FROM DdosStatelessBackgroundTable AS Z WHERE (Z.`Client Port`=Y.SourcePortTag OR Z.`Server Port`=Y.SourcePortTag)) AS TotalBandwidth FROM (SELECT X.StartTime AS ST,X.StartTime+X.Duration AS ET,X.Bandwidth AS BW,X.SourcePortTag AS PT FROM DdosAttackTable AS X),DdosAttackTable AS Y WHERE Y.SourcePortTag=PT AND Y.StartTime BETWEEN ST AND ET GROUP BY Y.StartTime ORDER BY Time

set_command_pass_fail_state.description: Return FAIL if over-subscription is detected

command_pass_fail_state.description: Check whether we stay within 100% bandwidth

sql_statement.static: SELECT Port,Time AS `Time (s)`,TotalBandwidth AS `Total Bandwidth (%)` FROM DdosBandwidthValidation WHERE TotalBandwidth > 100.0

table_verdict.failed_verdict_explanation: Configuration Error: Bandwidth over-subscription detected.  See Summary Results table for details.

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Value: ATDTC: Create Attack Frame Config Table

sql_statement.static: CREATE TABLE DdosAttackFrameConfigTable(AttackType INTEGER, name TEXT, description TEXT, frameSize INTEGER, pduData TEXT, addObject1 TEXT, addObject2 TEXT, addObject3 TEXT, addObject4 TEXT, addObject5 TEXT, addObject6 TEXT)

table: ARP Reply packets with random source MAC/sender MAC and sender IP
Fake Session attack using a random source IP address and incrementing destination TCP port
ICMP Fragmentation attack using random source IP address, random IP fragment offset, and random IP id
ICMP ping payload using IP fragmentation for maximum buffer size overflow
ICMP Echo requests sent to 16 bit "subnet" of destination address
IP Fragmentation too many datagrams, random identification with random fragment offset
LAND attack with TCP-SYN where source IP = dest IP and source port = dest port
IP packet with more than 38 bytes of options
NTP Monlist attack with get monlist requests to an NTP server with random source IP address
Flood of NDP NS messages using random source IPv6 Address and MAC Address (FIXME: Bad ICMPv6 Checksum)
IP Fragmentation attack targeting Linux bug
Subnet ICMP Destination Unreachable attack using stepped (lowest 8-bit) IP addresses
TCP-SYN sent to all destination ports for configured destination IP
UDP packets sent to all destination ports for configured destination IP
TCP fragmented packet missing the first fragment
TCP ACK Flood attack using random source IP and port and incrementing dest port
Fragmented TCP ACK Flood attack using random source IP, random fragment offset, and stepped TCP ports
TCP FIN Flood attack using random source IP and stepped destination TCP port
TCP PUSH-ACK Flood attack using random source IP and stepped destination TCP port
TCP RST Flood attack using random source IP and stepped destination TCP port
TCP SYN Flood attack using random source IP and stepped destination TCP port
TCP SYN-ACK Flood attack using random source IP and stepped destination TCP port
Flood of UDP fragmented packets with random UDP destination port and overlapping IP fragment offsets
ICMP Source-Quench attack for a single source to single destination
FIXME: Not implemented. Needs support for random frame size.
UDP Flood attack using random dest port
Flood of UDP fragmented packets with random UDP destination port and random IP fragment offsets
TCP packet flood with FIN + URG + PSH to random source ip, random source TCP port, and stepped destination TCP port

SELECT CASE CAST(a AS INT) WHEN 7 THEN '111' WHEN 6 THEN '110' WHEN 5 THEN '101' WHEN 4 THEN '100' WHEN 3 THEN '11' WHEN 2 THEN '10' WHEN 1 THEN '1' ELSE '0' END FROM (SELECT `Client VLAN Priority` AS a FROM DdosStatelessBackgroundTable WHERE rowid =

SELECT CASE CAST(a AS INT) WHEN 7 THEN '111' WHEN 6 THEN '110' WHEN 5 THEN '101' WHEN 4 THEN '100' WHEN 3 THEN '11' WHEN 2 THEN '10' WHEN 1 THEN '1' ELSE '0' END FROM (SELECT `Client Inner VLAN Priority` AS a FROM DdosStatelessBackgroundTable WHERE rowid =

SELECT CASE CAST(a AS INT) WHEN 7 THEN '111' WHEN 6 THEN '110' WHEN 5 THEN '101' WHEN 4 THEN '100' WHEN 3 THEN '11' WHEN 2 THEN '10' WHEN 1 THEN '1' ELSE '0' END FROM (SELECT `Server VLAN Priority` AS a FROM DdosStatelessBackgroundTable WHERE rowid =

SELECT CASE CAST(a AS INT) WHEN 7 THEN '111' WHEN 6 THEN '110' WHEN 5 THEN '101' WHEN 4 THEN '100' WHEN 3 THEN '11' WHEN 2 THEN '10' WHEN 1 THEN '1' ELSE '0' END FROM (SELECT `Server Inner VLAN Priority` AS a FROM DdosStatelessBackgroundTable WHERE rowid =

transfer_data.description: Create the DdosBaselineGoodput table

sql_statement.static: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS DdosBaselineGoodput(TxPortName TEXT, RxPortName TEXT, ParentStreamBlock INTEGER, StatelessGoodput FLOAT)

transfer_data.description: Store the baseline goodput

sql_statement.static: SELECT (SELECT Port.Name FROM Port WHERE Port.Handle=(SELECT ParentHnd FROM StreamBlock WHERE StreamBlock.Handle=ParentStreamBlock)) AS TxPortName,PortName AS RxPortName,ParentStreamBlock,OctetCount*1000000.0/(LastArrivalTime-FirstArrivalTime) AS StatelessGoodput FROM RxEotStreamResults WHERE
ParentStreamBlock IN (SELECT SourceHnd FROM RelationTable WHERE TargetHnd=(SELECT Handle FROM Tag WHERE Name LIKE '%ttStreamBlock')) ORDER BY TxPortName

transfer_data.description: Get a new start time

Value.description: Stop the Background StreamBlocks, they are tagged with ttStreamBlock

Children.Name: PDC: Store Attack Phase Data & Set Verdict

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Value: PDC: Store Attack Phase Data & Set Verdict

transfer_data.description: Create the DdosAttackPhaseGoodput table

sql_statement.static: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS DdosAttackPhaseGoodput(TxPortName TEXT, RxPortName TEXT, ParentStreamBlock INTEGER, StatelessGoodput FLOAT)

transfer_data.description: Store the attack phase goodput

sql_statement.static: SELECT (SELECT Port.Name FROM Port WHERE Port.Handle=(SELECT ParentHnd FROM StreamBlock WHERE StreamBlock.Handle=ParentStreamBlock)) AS TxPortName,PortName AS RxPortName,ParentStreamBlock,(CASE WHEN IsExpectedPort=1 THEN OctetCount ELSE 0 END)*1000000.0/(LastArrivalTime-FirstArrivalTime) AS StatelessGoodput FROM RxEotStreamResults WHERE ParentStreamBlock IN (SELECT SourceHnd FROM RelationTable WHERE TargetHnd=(SELECT Handle FROM Tag WHERE Name LIKE '%ttStreamBlock')) ORDER BY TxPortName

transfer_data.description: Store the attack frame counts

sql_statement.static: SELECT PortName,ParentStreamBlock,FrameCount FROM TxEotStreamResults WHERE ParentStreamBlock IN (SELECT Handle FROM StreamBlock WHERE StreamBlock.Handle IN (SELECT SourceHnd FROM RelationTable WHERE Type='UserTag' AND TargetHnd IN (SELECT Tag.Handle FROM Tag WHERE Tag.Name LIKE 'A%DdosStreamBlock%')))

SELECT ROUND(SumGoodput,4) AS `Total Stateless Throughput (Bps)`,CASE WHEN SumBaseline>0 THEN ROUND(100*SumGoodput/SumBaseline,2) ELSE 'Did not receive Sanity Phase Goodput' END AS `Attack Phase / Sanity Phase Background Throughput (%)`,SumFrameCount AS `Total Attack Frame Count`,CASE WHEN SumBaseline==0 THEN 'N/A' WHEN 100*SumGoodput>=

*SumBaseline THEN 'Pass' ELSE 'Fail' END AS `Test Verdict` FROM (SELECT COALESCE(SUM(StatelessGoodput),0) AS SumGoodput FROM DdosAttackPhaseGoodput),(SELECT COALESCE(SUM(FrameCount),0) AS SumFrameCount FROM DdosAttackFrameCounts),(SELECT COALESCE(SUM(StatelessGoodput),0) AS SumBaseline FROM DdosBaselineGoodput)
*SumBaseline FROM (SELECT SUM(StatelessGoodput) AS SumGoodput FROM DdosAttackPhaseGoodput),(SELECT SUM(StatelessGoodput) AS SumBaseline FROM DdosBaselineGoodput)

table_verdict.passed_verdict_explanation: Goodput during attack phase is within threshold.
table_verdict.failed_verdict_explanation: Goodput during attack phase is below threshold.
